text: O veruyushchiye! Ne teryayte nagradu Allakha za vashi blagodeyaniya, soprovozhdaya ikh poprokami ili obidoy i pokazyvaya lyudyam, chto vy okazyvayete blagodeyaniya nuzhdayushchimsya; inache vy upodobites' tem, kotoryye tratyat svoyo imushchestvo radi slavy ili pokhval ot lyudey, ne verya v Allakha i v Sudnyy den'. Litsemer, kotoryy takim obrazom okazyvayet pomoshch', podoben gladkoy skale, pokrytoy zemloy, na kotoruyu obrushilsya liven' i smyl zemlyu, ostaviv skalu goloy. Kak liven' smyvayet s gladkoy skaly plodorodnuyu zemlyu, poproki, obida i litsemeriye stirayut nagrazhdeniye Allakha za takuyu milostynyu. Besplodnymi budut takiye deyaniya i ne budet nagrady za nikh. Eto - kachestva, prisushchiye yazychnikam. Otklonites' ot etikh kachestv. Allakh ne vedot nevernykh po pryamomu puti k blagu
